subs.text: So many sentences these days begin with If we survive this. Well, if we survive this, there will certainly be a movie about Donald Trump. Probably many. Will there be something like the scene from the bunker where Hitler hears how something is fucked up and gets really upset about it? Will we come to think of Trump as a joke? Or what?
And who will play Trump? I have a feeling Brad Pitt will make a good Trump. I wouldn't be surprised if he's thinking about it now.
